catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 156
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: male figure in white robes seated, leaning PL arm on bent tree trunk, with eyes closed, peaceful look on face; scroll, book, and teapot to his R; pine boughs at top and R
markings: Marks along top of dowel, at L: [606 / Setsuzan] and R: various; LRC: [Unzen]; [Setsuzan]
object_name: Hanging scroll, one of a triptych
title: Hermit [center of a triptych of Doves, Hermit, and Kingfisher]
